name: Haunted Horror Stories: Gone With The Wind
storyline:
Michigan, 1984. Disappearances have become commonplace in the city of shadewood. Uncertainty and mistrust dominate the police department.

Meanwhile, Emily sets out on an exciting morning for another day of school. Join her on this journey!
summary:
HHS: Gone With The Wind is a single player game with psx era aesthetics.
An authentic retro horror with music, fixed cameras, environment, graphics, filters, and gameplay faithful to its aesthetics.
